name: Slide Me Out
description:
Test your brain with this amazing block puzzle game!

*****

Addictive puzzle game with 4 difficulties, 400 unique levels and many
hours of fun! Your goal: to move a specific block to the designated
field. Be fast, be clever and keep sliding!

Features:

** iPhone 5 Support
** 3D graphics
** 4 difficulties
** 400 levels
** Retina support
** Game Center leaderboards
